Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
Basketball, Football, Hockey, Soccer
public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Game is an abstract class that allow of abstract methods to be created Game consist of four abstract classes that will be used in each class that extends Game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Game()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract int getPeriod()
    abstract int getPeriod will be used to return the current period
    abstract java.lang.String getPeriodName()
    abstract String getPeriodName will be used to gte the period name
    abstract ScoringMethod[] getScoreArray()
    abstract ScoringMethod[] will get the score array
    abstract boolean isGameOver()
    abstract boolean isGameOver will be used to tell when the game is over
    abstract void updateScore​(int option)
    abstract void updateScore will be used to update the score based on the option the user picks from the score array

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
